verses.verse: It is a <S%H2896>good<s%> thing to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> to sing <S%H2167>praises<s%> to your <S%H8034>name,<s%> Most <S%H5945>High;<s%>
to <S%H5046>proclaim<s%> your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and your <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> every <S%H3915>night,<s%>
with the <S%H6218>ten-stringed<s%> <S%H5035>lute,<s%> with the harp, and with the <S%H1902>melody<s%> of the <S%H3658>lyre.<s%>
For <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, have made me <S%H8055>glad<s%> through your <S%H6467>work.<s%> I will <S%H7442>triumph<s%> in the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%>
A <S%H1198>senseless<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know, neither does a <S%H3684>fool<s%> understand <S%H995>this:<s%>

though the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6524>spring<s%> up as the <S%H6212>grass,<s%> and all the <S%H205>evildoers<s%> <S%H6466><s%> <S%H6692>flourish,<s%> they will be <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H5703>forever.<s%>
<S%H341>For,<s%> behold, your enemies, <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H341>for,<s%> behold, your enemies shall <S%H6>perish.<s%> All the <S%H205>evildoers<s%> <S%H6466><s%> will be <S%H6504>scattered.<s%>
But you have exalted my <S%H7161>horn<s%> like that of the wild <S%H7214>ox.<s%> I am <S%H1101>anointed<s%> with <S%H7488>fresh<s%> <S%H8081>oil.<s%>
My <S%H5869>eye<s%> has also <S%H5027>seen<s%> my <S%H7790>enemies.<s%> My <S%H241>ears<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H7489>wicked<s%> enemies who rise up against <S%H6965>me.<s%>
The <S%H6662>righteous<s%> shall <S%H6524>flourish<s%> like the palm <S%H8558>tree.<s%> He will <S%H7685>grow<s%> like a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%>
They are <S%H8362>planted<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> They will <S%H6524>flourish<s%> in our <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H2691>courts.<s%>
They will still bring forth <S%H5107>fruit<s%> in old <S%H7872>age.<s%> They will be full of <S%H1879>sap<s%> and <S%H7488>green,<s%>
to <S%H5046>show<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H3477>upright.<s%> He is my <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and there is no unrighteousness in <S%H5766>him.<s%>
